title: Bring-A-Mate include previous referrals?
body:
I got my brother into league of legends about 2+ years ago and he used my name as his referral. Will that be included in the Bring-A-Mate system, or do I need to start from the beginning?

(I've actually convinced way more than 5 of my friends to play this game, but it was during a time when referrals were disabled :c Boooo)

replies.body:
Hi LiAMfACE,

Everyone starts from the beginning with Bring a Mate, however we did go through accounts that had used RAF on other servers (before transferring to Oceania) and gift them the appropriate level of Skins / IP for those referrals.

If you have referred friends using the RAF system on another server in the past, and you didn't get any IP/Skin yesterday, let us know via a support request and we can check it out.

Cheers
Mindstar
I'm not too sure. I think referrals made before the "Bring-A-Mate" thing started don't count towards it.
